hero.subtitle: Transform your iPhone into a smart camera that automatically centers and tracks you. Perfect for rock climbing, workouts, and solo content creation.
hero.developmentNote: Movtrak is currently under active development and will be available on the App Store soon. Stay tuned for updates!

features.title: Why Choose
features.smartTrackingDesc: Automatically keeps you centered in the frame using advanced AI computer vision. No cameraman needed.
features.builtForActionDesc: Ideal for dynamic sports like rock climbing, running, and home workouts where you need to move freely.
features.proQualityDesc: Record stable, high-quality video with smooth tracking movements that look professional.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Launch Movtrak on your iOS device.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Position camera towards yourself or the activity.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Tap record - AI automatically detects and centers you.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Go ahead! The camera follows your movement.
howItWorks.step5Desc: Stop recording and export your perfectly framed video.
